@ape7458 I agree, and I guess that's my take.  We all have a responsibility to make Web 3 successful. And that's why I'm supporting Web 3 vs. W2 Cos despite their imperfections. LR is doing better, still work to do, but I'm going to give them a chance because it benefits us all.

@ape7458 It's a good debate and I appreciate it.  The Pros would be that there are more buyers (demand) on OS which make our assets more liquid and support other chains.  But I like the thought of a real Web 3.0 Co in LR.  Full transparency, I am still in it so I do have a bias.
@ape7458 I may have forgotten to include the lower fees (I assume we're all clear on that)

@ape7458 Counter argument:  It was (and still is) beta, improving daily and communicates clearly.  Gives you both rewards (which may or may not be useless) and distribute WETH (which has fairly provable value).
@ape7458 Ok - When has LR not not worked?  And was the pump and dump done by external or internal teams?
@ape7458 Ok, I‚Äôll bite.  Pros and cons of OS vs. LR?
